title: Ichinen Buri no The Animation
synopsis: As the summer break begins, a certain college student decides to pay a visit to his family in the countryside. Having been away for more than a year, he wants to cherish every moment of tranquility in sleepy rural surroundings, far from the hustle and bustle of a major city.
staff: [['Oota, Hideta', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Sawayama, Shinichiro', ['Script']], ['Shouji, Ayumu', ['Original Creator']], ['Yamamoto, Sawako', ['Animation Director']]]
